title: First Class Train Journeys
metaTitle: World's Most Luxurious Train Journeys: First Class Experiences
metaDescription: Exploring the world's most luxurious rail experiences, from historic routes to modern high-speed services with premium amenities.
excerpt: Discover the romance and luxury of first-class train travel with our guide to the world's most spectacular rail journeys.
body:
First-class train travel offers a unique blend of luxury, comfort, and scenic beauty. Here's our guide to the world's most spectacular rail journeys:

European Classics:
- Venice Simplon-Orient-Express: Iconic luxury through Europe
- Belmond Royal Scotsman: Scottish highlands in style
- Golden Eagle Danube Express: Eastern European elegance

Asian Adventures:
- Maharajas' Express: Indian luxury and heritage
- Eastern & Oriental Express: Southeast Asian splendor
- Seven Stars in Kyushu: Japanese perfection

African Experiences:
- Rovos Rail: Luxury through Southern Africa
- Blue Train: South African elegance
- Shongololo Express: Pan-African adventure

Modern High-Speed:
- Eurostar Business Premier: London to Paris in style
- TGV First Class: French high-speed luxury
- Shinkansen Green Car: Japanese efficiency and comfort

Pro tip: Book well in advance for popular routes, especially during peak seasons. Consider combining train journeys with other modes of transport for a complete luxury travel experience.
author: Rodney Pattison
